Package org.wmn4j.notation

Class GraceNoteChord

java.lang.Object
org.wmn4j.notation.GraceNoteChord
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<GraceNote>, Ornamental
public final class GraceNoteChord extends Object implements Ornamental, Iterable<GraceNote>
Represents a chord consisting of grace notes.

This class is immutable.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.wmn4j.notation.Ornamental

  • Method Details

    • of

      public static GraceNoteChord of(Collection<GraceNote> notes)
      Returns an instance with the given GraceNotes.
      Parameters:
      notes - A non-empty and non-null Collection of GraceNote objects
      Returns:
      a chord with the given notes
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if notes is null.
      IllegalArgumentException - if notes is empty or all GraceNote objects in notes are do not have same displayable duration and grace note type.

    • getNote

      public GraceNote getNote(int fromLowest)
      Returns the GraceNote at the given index counting from lowest staff position in this GraceNoteChord. The position is indicated by the display pitch of the note (see GraceNote.getDisplayPitch()).
      Parameters:
      fromLowest - index of note, 0 being the lowest note in the chord
      Returns:
      the note from index fromLowest
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if fromLowest is smaller than 0 or at least the number of notes in this chord

    • getLowest

      public GraceNote getLowest()
      Returns the lowest positioned grace note in this chord.
      Returns:
      the grace note with the lowest staff position in this chord
